it.ismb.pertlab.ogc.sensorthings.api.datamodel

Class Thing

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.ismb.pertlab.ogc.sensorthings.api.datamodel.Thing

  • public class Thing
extends Object
    Thing class.

    Definition: We use the ITU-T definition, i.e., with regard to the Internet of Things, a thing is an object of the physical world (physical things) or the information world (virtual things) which is capable of being identified and integrated into communication networks. (ITU-T Y.2060)

    Author:
    Dario Bonino

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Thing()
      The empty class constructor, implements the bean instantiation pattern.
      Thing(String description, String metadata)
      The class constructor, takes a Thing textual description and a metadat description.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Thing

        public Thing()
        The empty class constructor, implements the bean instantiation pattern.

      • Thing

        public Thing(String description,
     String metadata)
        The class constructor, takes a Thing textual description and a metadat description.
        Parameters:
        description - This is the description of the thing entity. The content is open to accommodate changes to SensorML and to support other description languages.
        metadata - Meant to host the Thing metadata, e.g. in JSON

      • getLocations

        public Set<Location> getLocations()
        Provides the list of locations in which this Thing has been registered. The returned set is Live reference to the internal data structure which is not Thread-safe. Synchronization and concurrent modification issues might arise in multi-threaded environments.
        Returns:
        the locations

      • setLocations

        public void setLocations(Set<Location> locations)
        Sets the list of locations in which this Thing has been registered. Replaces any existing list.
        Parameters:
        locations - the locations to set

      • addLocation

        public void addLocation(Location location)
        Adds one location to the list of Locations in which this Thing has been registered.
        Parameters:
        location -

      • removeLocation

        public boolean removeLocation(Location location)
        Removes one location from the set of locations in which this Thing instance was positioned.
        Parameters:
        location - The location to remove.
        Returns:
        true if removal is successful, false otherwise.

      • getDatastreams

        public Set<Datastream> getDatastreams()
        Provides the list of datastreams generated by this Thing. The returned set is Live reference to the internal data structure which is not Thread-safe. Synchronization and concurrent modification issues might arise in multi-threaded environments.
        Returns:
        the Set<Datastream> of datastreams generated by this Thing instance.

      • setDatastreams

        public void setDatastreams(Set<Datastream> datastreams)
        Sets the list of datastreams generated by this thing. Removes any list previously existing.
        Parameters:
        datastreams - the datastreams to set.

      • addDatastream

        public void addDatastream(Datastream datastream)
        Add a single datastream to the list of datastreams generated by this Thing instance.
        Parameters:
        datastream - The Datastream instance to add.

      • removeDataStream

        public boolean removeDataStream(Datastream datastream)
        Removes the given datastream from the list of datastreams generated by this Thing instance.
        Parameters:
        datastream - The Datastream instance to remove.
        Returns:
        true if removal was successful, false otherwise.
